# Basic Mobile 5GB

## Plan Overview
The Basic Mobile 5GB (PLAN-IND-5GB) is designed for individuals seeking affordable coverage.

**Monthly Cost**: $29.99/month

## Features
- Unlimited talk and text nationwide
- 5GB high-speed data
- Data speeds reduced after allowance reached
- 5GB mobile hotspot included
- 480p SD streaming

## Network Coverage
- 5G Ultra Wideband access in select cities
- 5G Nationwide coverage
- 4G LTE coverage in 99% of the US population
- International roaming in 200+ countries (charges apply)


### Loyalty Tier Benefits
- **Platinum**: 20% discount on accessories, priority customer service, annual device credit
- **Gold**: 15% discount on accessories, priority customer service
- **Silver**: 10% discount on accessories
- **Bronze**: Standard benefits, earning points toward tier advancement

## How to Sign Up
1. Visit any retail location with valid ID
2. Call customer service at 1-800-555-CELL
3. Sign up online at account portal
4. Download the mobile app and complete digital enrollment

## Plan Changes
Plans can be changed at any time through the mobile app or customer service. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades apply at next billing cycle.

## Additional Information
- Taxes and fees additional (approximately 10-15% depending on location)
- Autopay discount: $5/month per line when enrolled
- Paper-free billing discount: $2/month per line
- Military and veteran discount: 15% off

## Compatible Devices
All 5G and 4G LTE devices are compatible with this plan including:
- iPhone 12 and later
- Samsung Galaxy S20 and later
- Google Pixel 4 and later
- Most unlocked devices with VoLTE support

## Terms and Conditions
Service subject to terms of service agreement. Early termination fees may apply for promotional pricing. See full terms at website or in-store.

# iPhone 16 - User Guide

## Product Overview
The iPhone 16 (DEV-IPH16) is Apple's latest flagship smartphone available on our network.

**Retail Price**: $999.00
**Payment Options**:
- Full retail price
- 24-month installment: $41.62/month
- 36-month installment: $27.75/month


### Technical Specifications
- **Display**: 6.1" Super Retina XDR OLED (6.7" for Pro Max)
- **Processor**: A18 Pro chip
- **Storage Options**: 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, 1TB
- **Camera**: 48MP main + 12MP ultra-wide (+ 12MP telephoto on Pro models)
- **Battery**: All-day battery life (up to 29 hours video playback on Pro Max)
- **5G**: Sub-6GHz and mmWave support
- **eSIM**: Dual eSIM support, no physical SIM tray
- **Operating System**: iOS 18


### Initial Setup with Our Network
1. **eSIM Activation**:
   - Open Settings > Cellular > Add eSIM
   - Scan the QR code provided in your welcome email or retail receipt
   - Or enter activation details manually from your account
2. **Carrier Settings**: Automatically downloaded upon eSIM activation
3. **WiFi Calling**: Enable in Settings > Phone > WiFi Calling
4. **Visual Voicemail**: Configured automatically with your plan
5. **5G Settings**: Manage in Settings > Cellular > Voice & Data

## Troubleshooting

### No Service / Signal Issues
1. Toggle Airplane mode on/off
2. Restart the device
3. Check for carrier settings update
4. Remove and re-add eSIM
5. Contact customer support if issue persists

### eSIM Activation Failed (Error Code E4527)
1. Ensure device is connected to WiFi
2. Verify activation QR code hasn't expired (valid 24 hours)
3. Check that device is not already activated on another account
4. Try manual activation entry instead of QR scan
5. Contact customer support with error code for assistance

### Slow Data Speeds
1. Check data usage - speeds reduced after premium data threshold
2. Toggle 5G/LTE in settings
3. Check for network outages in your area via app
4. Move to area with better coverage
5. Consider plan upgrade for more premium data

## Warranty and Support
- **Manufacturer Warranty**: 1 year limited warranty
- **Device Protection**: Available for $18.0/month
- **Support**: 24/7 technical support via app, chat, or phone

## Trade-In Value
Trade in your old device for credit toward this purchase:
- Devices in good condition: Up to $399 credit
- Devices with damage: Up to $149 credit
- Check current trade-in values in the mobile app

## Accessories
Compatible accessories available:
- MagSafe cases and chargers
- Screen protectors
- Wireless chargers
- Car mounts

Loyalty tier members receive discounts on accessories: Platinum (20%), Gold (15%), Silver (10%).
